name: Grand Royal Hotel
description: Experience luxury and comfort at Grand Royal Hotel. Nestled in the heart of the city, we offer elegant rooms, top-notch amenities, and exceptional service for an unforgettable stay.

name: Central Plaza Inn
description: Stay at Central Plaza Inn and enjoy a perfect blend of modern comfort and historic charm. Located in the city's vibrant center, we provide a welcoming retreat for all travelers.

name: Danube Riverside Hotel
description: Discover elegance at Danube Riverside Hotel. Overlooking the stunning river, our hotel offers premium accommodations, fine dining, and a serene atmosphere in the heart of the city.
